labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Gaode Weather" is designed to fetch real-time weather information using the Gaode Map API. Its primary function is to provide weather data, which can be integrated into applications to enhance user experience with current weather updates. The available tool suggests a focus on weather-related functionalities and API integration.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Weather" is chosen as it directly describes the server's core functionality of fetching weather data. The secondary label "API Integration" is relevant because the server interacts with the Gaode Map API to provide weather services. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately describe the server's functionality.

server_info_crawled.overview: Fetch current weather information for your city using the Gaode Map API. Easily integrate weather data into your applications and enhance user experience with real-time updates. Start building your weather-aware applications today!

tools.name: 高德天气查询助手
tools.description: Deploy Server Gaode Weather @kevinkelin/mcp-gaodeweather-server Try in Playground

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@kevinkelin/mcp-gaodeweather-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: gaodeKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: The API key to access Gaode weather service.
